scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:seed:all && NODE_ENV=test jest --runInBand --passWithNoTests
scripts.dev-db:reset: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.test-db:reset: NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:seed:all
